import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Button } from "semantic-ui-react"; import spotifyplaylist from "../media/spotifyplaylist.jpg"; class WordPosterProject extends Component { render() { return (

the Little Word Poster

also known as, ultimatify (does this name work? feedback is welcome!). using spotify's authorization window, this program will connect to you and a friend's spotify accounts to find shared songs and make the playlist. the end result is a collaborative playlist made on the first user's account and followed by the second user's account. i used python, flask, and spotipy, a python library for spotify, to complete this project. all code is documented on github.

{/* github */}
); } } export default WordPosterProject;
